sentences.en: Classification of the Haemophilus - like bacterium has been only tentatively determined.
sentences.cn: 在分类上把这种细菌只是暂时性地作为类嗜血杆菌.
真菌类分类仍然是未定形的.

sentences.en: In Junge's classification maritime particles are composed entirely of hygroscopic material.
sentences.cn: 按照Junge分类法,海洋性粒子完全由吸湿性物质所组成.

sentences.en: More modern classification schemes have been devised , and could be devised.
sentences.cn: 更现代的分类系统已经或即将编制出来.

sentences.en: Most control system fall in the " closed - loop " classification.
sentences.cn: 大多数控制系统属于 “ 闭环 式 ” 范畴.

sentences.en: Notation may also increase the memory value of a classification scheme.
sentences.cn: 标记符号也可以增进分类体系的助记程度.

sentences.en: Object Description: This may be simple classification or verbal description.
sentences.cn: 物体描述: 可能是简单分类,或者是一般语言描述.

sentences.en: the classification of wines according to quality
The parallelism in the classification of organisms and phytocoenoses is realized.
sentences.cn: 人们已认识到生物分类和植物群落分类是平行的.

sentences.en: The parallelism in the classification of organisms and phytocoenoses is relised.
sentences.cn: 在认识上生物分类和植物群落分类是平行的.

sentences.en: The physical world was and still is indifferent to the mathematicians'classification.
sentences.cn: 物理界过去和现在都是从不关心数学家们的分类的.

sentences.en: The simplest basis for classification is in terms of structure or texture.
sentences.cn: 最简单的分类基础是结构或构造.

sentences.en: There is a hierarchy in the classification of all living creatures.
sentences.cn: 一切生物均可按等级分类.

sentences.en: These things belong in a different classification.
sentences.cn: 这些东西属于不同的类别.

sentences.en: This classification is the analogy of our previous picture of stable orbits.
sentences.cn: 这种区分类似于前面的稳定轨道图形.

sentences.en: While Clements'work was widely influential, his classification has little current use.
sentences.cn: 虽然Clements的工作影响面很宽, 但它的分类未被普遍采用.

words.tran_cn: [测][遥感] 分类器；分类者；分类词

phrases.tran_cn: 分类规则；船级规定；分类基准
按职能别分类，按用途分类
工作分类；职位分类；职务分类
安全等级；安全保密级别

trans.tran_cn: 分类，类别，分类法，分类系统
trans.tran_en: a process in which you put something into the group or class it belongs to
